tool_description: This API is a simple GeoLocation API based on the MaxMind DB with a few extra network tools integrated.
name: CDN Depo GeoIP
title: CDN Depo GeoIP

api_list.name: Dynamic XML GeoIP Location
api_list.description: This endpoint provides an XML response based on your IP.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bolvarak-cdn-depo-geoip-v1.p.rapidapi.com/xml"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bolvarak-cdn-depo-geoip-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bolvarak-cdn-depo-geoip-v1.p.rapidapi.com/xml"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bolvarak-cdn-depo-geoip-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Static JSON/JSONP GeoIP Location
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a JSON or JSONP response for a specific IP address.  Simply add a callback GET parameter to trigger the JSONP response.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: This parameter triggers a JSONP response

api_list.name: Static XML GeoIP Location
api_list.description: This endpoint returns an XML response for a specific IP address.

api_list.name: Dynamic JSON/JSONP GeoIP Location
api_list.description: This endpoint will send a JSON or JSONP response based on your IP.  Simply add a callback URL parameter to trigger the JSONP response.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: This parameter is used to trigger a JSONP response from the server.
